suggest.spryker-shop/shop-application: Use this module when using plugins that need ShopApplication dependencies.
suggest.spryker/router: If you want to use RouteProviderPlugins to be added to the Route Module.
suggest.spryker/silex: Use this module when using plugins that need Silex dependencies.
suggest.spryker/container: Use this module when you want to use the ErrorPageEventDispatcherPlugin.
suggest.spryker/event-dispatcher: Use this module when you want to use the ErrorPageEventDispatcherPlugin.
